reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: MY DAUGHTER LOVED THIS BAG GREAT DESIGN ON IT. THE BAG FITS ANY SIZE GIRL JUST NICE AND COMPACT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect travel companion.
reviews.reviewText: I loved this bag for flying alone + a short cruise with friends. I easily kept my passport and small wallet in one pocket. My phone, sunglasses, and meds in the middle pocket, and misc hair ties, bobby pins, and cruise room key in the small front zipper pocket. My candy wrappers and receipts got stuffed in the non-zipper pocket. Even with all of those items, there was plenty of room to spare in the two big pockets for car keys, portable phone charger, small cords, etc.Friends on my trip commented on how handy and cute it was, and I in turn replied, "I got it on Amazon super cheap. Love it!" - of course. I wore it on my front and back through the trip, as needed. From traveling alone to tan lines, I appreciated the versatility of switching where it was on my body.It is admittedly what you get for the price. Although it held up fine for my trip, the overall material does *feel* cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bag, fair price, questionable quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of this bag. I carry a phone, wristlet wallet, keys and hand sanitizer and there's plenty of room for other items. However I am sorry to say after less than 2 months it is coming apart at one of the seams. Hopefully my 'mend'/repair will suffice to give me many more months of service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We bought this bag to take on a trip. The size is perfect for a large phone, large wallet, keys, water bottles, etc. It’s comfortable and cute. The zippers work well and it’s sturdy. We used it walking and biking. We were very pleased with the purchase and highly recommend the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small sling bag
reviews.reviewText: I loved the size, still fits the basic but not huge or bulky. Cute black with gold accents.. Had to give only 3 stars as after one use it split open by zipper and I missed deadline by one day to return it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little sling crossbody!
reviews.reviewText: Well made, cute and roomy. Three compartments and a pocket! I tried several more expensive bags, but this one is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update - I hate this bag. I used it today when I went to the casino and it’s such a pain in the butt and so awkward that the zippers zip to the wrong side. Plus the strap dug into my neck pretty bad. I guess I needed to tighten it more too because it kept slipping and falling to my side. For such a slim bag, I kept bumping it into the chairs as i was pulling out/pushing in the chairs. It was the weirdest thing. How can there be a learning curve with a bag? It looked like I was wearing a sling for a broken arm. Sling bags are NOT for me. Too bad.I'm torn on this bag. It's $10 so how much can I really complain. I think some of the pictures are deceiving because they show the bag being worn to the right or left. I bought the black bag with the gold zippers, and it can only be worn to the right (over my left shoulder, sitting on my right hip area). If I try to wear it to the left, the strap flips around and then the bag flips around so the back of the bag faces out. I also agree with another reviewer that the zippers seem to be on the wrong side. The bag is really cute and it's a great size and I LOVE that my phone fits in the open pocket in the front, but the bag is just awkward to wear. It would be nice if the strap was able to be worn on either side and I wish the zippers could work on either side too. BUT again, it's $10 and for $10 it's a great bag. I'm going to keep it. Maybe I'll get used to wearing it.Also, just want to mention that the strap is very long. I’m a size 20 and the strap still had plenty of room to extend beyond what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Greet bag for personal use
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this bag as it fits my wallet and allows me to carry it conveniently wherever I go.It’s a great Crossbody bag, and the design is very good!

reviews.reviewTitle: Carries More Than You Think It Would
reviews.reviewText: I noticed the fanny sling trend over the past few months, but didn't really buy into it til now. Even though it's not exactly the same, this is a great alternative to a traditional purse. The colours are vibrant a cute, there's slots in the side of the bag for wires to come through if you want to store your phone and listen to music, or if you wanted to connect to a battery pack in the bag. The strap is adjustable and suitable for plus-sized people to use without it sitting at a weird place on your body. The bag itself has 5 compartments, including one on the back for more important items, and the main compartment is big enough to fit my wallet, which a friend once referred to as a briefcase. 0 complaints, great little big for day trips
Perfect for outings or trips to the mall! Fits wallet, keys, water bottle, and deodorant and medication, with some extra space!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cute little bag and great value
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about the bag except the colour isn’t as pictures. It is more of a lilac color than baby pink.
Love it so neat and compact,fast shipping
